GlobalRegistry
public class NamingServerRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements GlobalRegistry

An implementation of GlobalRegistry that uses the WhitePagesService.

Method Detail

configure

public void configure(java.util.Map namingEntries)
Description copied from interface: GlobalRegistry
Configure the local server's rebind/unbind entries.

These address should be constant for the lifetime of the server. This method should only be called when the registry is first created.

Specified by:
configure in interface GlobalRegistry
Parameters:
namingEntries - a Map of Strings to URIs
